abstract.p: A C Willment letter praises Melanie Rehak's March 26 profile of author Anne Carson0

block.p: Every week I scan the letters column hoping that someone will write to thank you for Melanie Rehak's profile of Anne Carson (March 26). So far no one has, so I will. The last few years have been a time of felicitous ferment in literature, with established talents producing major works as well as new voices emerging. Still, Carson's ''Autobiography of Red'' excited me as few other recent books have. Discovering it gave me an authentic ''looking into Chapman's Homer'' moment.
